titleStmt.title: The picture a tragæcomædie : as it was often presented with good allowance, at the Globe, and Blackefriers play-houses, by the Kings Maiesties seruants / written by Philip Massinger.
titleStmt.author: Massinger, Philip, 1583-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.N. for Thomas Walkley and are to be sould at his shoppe at the Eagle and Child in Brittains burse,

notesStmt.note: STC 17640 on reel 1074 is actually 17640.5.--Cf. reel guide.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
